meanings.sent1: After a long nap, the cat was reawakening to play.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, the sun reawakens the sleeping flowers.
meanings.sent3: The alarm clock had the important job of reawakening the whole family.
meanings.sent4: The gentle rain reawakening the dormant seeds in the soil.
meanings.sent5: The chirping birds signaled the reawakening of the forest.

meanings.sent1: The book's reawakening of history captivated the students.
meanings.sent2: The documentary sparked a reawakening of environmental consciousness.
meanings.sent3: The sudden appearance of a clown caused a reawakening of laughter in the room.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected plot twist led to a reawakening of interest in the movie.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh cookies brought a reawakening of hunger in the house.
